generated.css: #portada{font-family:Crimson Text,serif;font-weight:400;font-size:18px;text-align:justify}#novel,#portada{grid-area:main;padding:10px figcaption{position:absolute;bottom:0;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.5);width:100%}.card figure figcaption h3{color:#fff;padding:.75rem;font-size:1.25rem}.card p{font-size:1rem;line-height:1.5;padding:0 40px;color:#666;font-weight:600}.card a{padding:10px 30px;margin:10px 40px;background-color:rgba(128,255,0,.863);text-decoration:none;font-weight:600;color:#000;border-radius:.25rem;text-align:center;display:inline-block}.card a:hover{opacity:.6}#cards i{font-size:2em;color:wheat}#cards .btnFavorite{background-color:#000;border:none;cursor:pointer}#description{grid-area:description}#fav li{font-size:18px}#favorites{grid-area:favorites}#video h3{display:inline;padding:10px}#article li{font-style:italic}#article li img{display:block;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;height:66px;width:142px}span{font-style:italic;font-family:serif}.menu{background-color:#000;overflow:hidden;border:3px solid a.active{background-color:#96cf01;color:#000}.menu a:not(:first-child){display:none}.menu a.icon{float:right;display:block}.menu.responsive{position:relative}.menu.responsive a.icon{color:#000;background-color:#96cf01;position:absolute;right:0;top:0}.menu.responsive
